title: analogRead()
description: Reads the value from the specified analog pin.

fields.name: Parameters
fields.value: `pin` : the name of the analog input pin to read from (A0 to A5 on most boards, A0 to A6 on MKR boards, A0 to A7 on the Mini and Nano, A0 to A15 on the Mega).

fields.name: Returns
fields.value: The analog reading on the pin. Although it is limited to the resolution of the analog to digital converter (0-1023 for 10 bits or 0-4095 for 12 bits). Data type: `int`.
